data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Liu, Wan-Gang, Fabrizi, Silvia, Bai, Ming, Yang, Xing-Ke, Ahrens, Dirk (2014): A taxonomic review on the species of Tetraserica Ahrens, 2004, of China (Coleoptera, Scarabaeidae, Sericini). ZooKeys 448: 83-121, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.448.8429, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.448.8429
